data.actual_result: The first one that you unticked re-ticked itself
data.short_description: In Recent Mentions, if you untick both "Include everyone and here" and "Include role mentions" before the sheet closes, only one will remain
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Recent Mentions - Click the filter icon at top right - Untick both "Include everyone and here" and "Include role mentions" before the sheet closes - Re-open the filter sheet
